Uses of Package
org.javascool.proglets.game

Packages that use org.javascool.proglets.game
org.javascool.proglets.game   
 

Classes in org.javascool.proglets.game used by org.javascool.proglets.game
Accessible
           
Drawable
          This interface defines an object that can be drawn to a buffer
EventCatcher
          This interface defines an object that can tell the manager if it wants to catch an event.
EventListener
          This class stores an event : it contains a callback method that will be called if the event is triggered and an EventCatcher that should be asked if the event concerns it.
Functions
          Main class for this proglet, it implements EventCatcher to allow it to catch events : is you simply use onClick("exit"); Functions will be used as EventCatcher (but it always return true and catches the event when triggered)
Functions.Clock
          This class allows the proglet to trigger events regularly.
Geometry
          This class is parent of all the objects that are rectangular, that can be placed on the proglet's panel and recieve events if the mouse pointer is above them.
Group
           
GroupIterator
           
LinkedEventGroup
          This class allows the objects to recieve events with the syntax : object.onClick("callbackFunction"); The callback function is added to the global register of callback functions for this event associated with this, which implements EventCatcher so that the object can decide if it wants to catch the event or not.
StoredProperty
